articles.author: Nikhilesh De
articles.title: Coinbase Loses Most of Motion to Dismiss SEC Lawsuit - CoinDesk
articles.description: A judge ruled that the SEC made a plausible argument that Coinbase is operating as an unregistered broker, exchange and clearinghouse.
articles.content: A federal judge ruled that the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission brought enough of a case arguing that Coinbase is operating an unregistered broker, exchange and clearinghouse that its suit aga… [+2724 chars]

articles.title: Cocoa breaks $10,000 a tonne as shortages squeeze 'out of control' market - Financial Times
articles.description: Poor harvests in critical production areas in west Africa double global prices in two months
articles.content: Then $199 for 12 months. Insight and expertise in your hands with the iconic FT print edition, delivered Monday to Saturday.
